title: Catalyst makes alcohol and perfume from air
text:
Catalyst makes alcohol and perfume from air 6:00pm IST - 01:40 
A US start-up has developed a catalyst and reactor that turns air, sunlight and water into pure ethanol for use in consumer products like alcoholic spirits and perfume. Stuart McDill reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A US start-up has developed a catalyst and reactor that turns air, sunlight and water into pure ethanol for use in consumer products like alcoholic spirits and perfume. Stuart McDill reports.
